sn16.3:1.3: apakasseva kāyaṁ, apakassa cittaṁ, niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
sn16.3:1.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso jarudapānaṁ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṁ vā nadīviduggaṁ vā—
sn16.3:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha—
sn16.3:1.7: apakasseva kāyaṁ, apakassa cittaṁ, niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
sn16.3:2.2: apakasseva kāyaṁ, apakassa cittaṁ, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho.
sn16.3:2.5: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṁyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn16.3:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā ākāse pāṇiṁ cālesi.
sn16.3:3.2: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ ākāse pāṇi na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati;
sn16.3:3.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṁ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:3.5: yathāsakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano, evaṁ paresaṁ lābhena attamano hoti sumano;
sn16.3:3.6: evarūpo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṁ.
sn16.3:4.1: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṁ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:4.4: evaṁ paresaṁ lābhena attamano hoti sumano.
sn16.3:5.2: kathaṁrūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti, kathaṁrūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti?
sn16.3:5.3: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṁyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn16.3:5.4: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn16.3:5.5: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn16.3:6.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁcitto paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn16.3:6.2: ‘aho vata me dhammaṁ suṇeyyuṁ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṁ pasīdeyyuṁ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṁ kareyyun’ti;
sn16.3:6.3: evarūpassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti.
sn16.3:7.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁcitto paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn16.3:7.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
sn16.3:7.3: Aho vata me dhammaṁ suṇeyyuṁ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṁ ājāneyyuṁ, ājānitvā ca pana tathattāya paṭipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:7.4: Iti dhammasudhammataṁ paṭicca paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti, kāruññaṁ paṭicca anuddayaṁ paṭicca anukampaṁ upādāya paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
sn16.3:7.5: Evarūpassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti.
sn16.3:8.1: Kassapo, bhikkhave, evaṁcitto paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn16.3:8.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
sn16.3:8.3: Aho vata me dhammaṁ suṇeyyuṁ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṁ ājāneyyuṁ, ājānitvā ca pana tathattāya paṭipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:8.4: Iti dhammasudhammataṁ paṭicca paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti, kāruññaṁ paṭicca anuddayaṁ paṭicca anukampaṁ upādāya paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
sn16.3:8.5: Kassapena vā hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabban”ti.
